thread.title: Linux AIO Now Offers ISO Images with the Zorin OS's Core and Lite Editions
thread.title_full: Linux AIO Now Offers ISO Images with the Zorin OS's Core and Lite Editions

title: Linux AIO Now Offers ISO Images with the Zorin OS's Core and Lite Editions
text: Linux AIO Now Offers ISO Images with the Zorin OS's Core and Lite Editions Tuesday, 8 September 2015 (21 minutes ago) We're happy to introduce you today to a new Live DVD ISO image from the well-known Linux AIO project, which contains the basic, freely distributed editions of the popular Zorin OS GNU/Linux distribution. Softpedia was informed by the Linux AIO team about the new builds they're offering for download on the project's website, which include two Live DVD ISO images with the Core and Lite editions of Zorin OS 10 and Zorin OS 9 op...
